sqlMap.sql: ad.id as ad_id, ad.id_profesional as ad_id_profesional, ad.id_sell as ad_id_sell, ad.type as ad_type, ad.fromDate as ad_fromDate, ad.toDate as ad_toDate, ad.paidUp as ad_paidUp, ad.price as ad_price, ad.id_blob_data as ad_id_blob_data, ad.ext_blob_data as ad_ext_blob_data, ad.deleted as ad_deleted
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from ADVERTISEMENT ad
order by $orderByClause$

select
from ADVERTISEMENT ad where ad.id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.delete: delete from ad using ADVERTISEMENT ad
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ADVERTISEMENT (id_profesional, id_sell, type, fromDate, toDate, paidUp, price, id_blob_data, ext_blob_data, deleted) values (#idProfesional:INTEGER#, #idSell:INTEGER#, #type:INTEGER#, #fromdate:TIMESTAMP#, #todate:TIMESTAMP#, #paidup:INTEGER#, #price:DECIMAL#, #idBlobData:INTEGER#, #extBlobData:VARCHAR#, #deleted:INTEGER#)

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ADVERTISEMENT
id_profesional
id_sell
type
fromDate
toDate
paidUp
price
id_blob_data
ext_blob_data
deleted
)
values
#idProfesional:INTEGER#
#idSell:INTEGER#
#type:INTEGER#
#fromdate:TIMESTAMP#
#todate:TIMESTAMP#
#paidup:INTEGER#
#price:DECIMAL#
#idBlobData:INTEGER#
#extBlobData:VARCHAR#
#deleted:INTEGER#
)
sqlMap.update:
update ADVERTISEMENT ad
ad.id = #record.id:INTEGER#
ad.id_profesional = #record.idProfesional:INTEGER#
ad.id_sell = #record.idSell:INTEGER#
ad.type = #record.type:INTEGER#
ad.fromDate = #record.fromdate:TIMESTAMP#
ad.toDate = #record.todate:TIMESTAMP#
ad.paidUp = #record.paidup:INTEGER#
ad.price = #record.price:DECIMAL#
ad.id_blob_data = #record.idBlobData:INTEGER#
ad.ext_blob_data = #record.extBlobData:VARCHAR#
ad.deleted = #record.deleted:INTEGER#

update ADVERTISEMENT ad set ad.id = #record.id:INTEGER#, ad.id_profesional = #record.idProfesional:INTEGER#, ad.id_sell = #record.idSell:INTEGER#, ad.type = #record.type:INTEGER#, ad.fromDate = #record.fromdate:TIMESTAMP#, ad.toDate = #record.todate:TIMESTAMP#, ad.paidUp = #record.paidup:INTEGER#, ad.price = #record.price:DECIMAL#, ad.id_blob_data = #record.idBlobData:INTEGER#, ad.ext_blob_data = #record.extBlobData:VARCHAR#, ad.deleted = #record.deleted:INTEGER#

update ADVERTISEMENT
id_profesional = #idProfesional:INTEGER#
id_sell = #idSell:INTEGER#
type = #type:INTEGER#
fromDate = #fromdate:TIMESTAMP#
toDate = #todate:TIMESTAMP#
paidUp = #paidup:INTEGER#
price = #price:DECIMAL#
id_blob_data = #idBlobData:INTEGER#
ext_blob_data = #extBlobData:VARCHAR#
deleted = #deleted:INTEGER#
where id = #id:INTEGER#

update ADVERTISEMENT set id_profesional = #idProfesional:INTEGER#, id_sell = #idSell:INTEGER#, type = #type:INTEGER#, fromDate = #fromdate:TIMESTAMP#, toDate = #todate:TIMESTAMP#, paidUp = #paidup:INTEGER#, price = #price:DECIMAL#, id_blob_data = #idBlobData:INTEGER#, ext_blob_data = #extBlobData:VARCHAR#, deleted = #deleted:INTEGER# where id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.select:
select , prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, prof.description as profesionalDescription, null as sellName, null as categoryName from ADVERTISEMENT ad, PROFESIONAL prof where ad.id_sell = 0 and ad.id_profesional = prof.id
( ad.toDate >= #dateactive:DATETIME# AND #dateactive:DATETIME# >= ad.fromDate )
( prof.businessname LIKE #profesionalBusinessname:VARCHAR# OR prof.firstname LIKE #profesionalBusinessname:VARCHAR# OR prof.lastname LIKE #profesionalBusinessname:VARCHAR# )
union all select , prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, prof.description as profesionalDescription, s.name as sellName, null as categoryName from ADVERTISEMENT ad, PROFESIONAL prof, SELL s where ad.id_sell != 0 and s.id = ad.id_sell and ad.id_profesional = prof.id
( ad.toDate >= #dateactive:DATETIME# AND #dateactive:DATETIME# >= ad.fromDate )
( prof.businessname LIKE #profesionalBusinessname:VARCHAR# OR prof.firstname LIKE #profesionalBusinessname:VARCHAR# OR prof.lastname LIKE #profesionalBusinessname:VARCHAR# )

select , prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, prof.description as profesionalDescription, null as sellName, null as categoryName from ADVERTISEMENT ad, PROFESIONAL prof where ad.type = 1 and ad.deleted = 0 and ad.id_sell = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 and ad.id_profesional = prof.id and ad.toDate >= CURDATE() and CURDATE() >= ad.fromDate union all select , prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, prof.description as profesionalDescription, s.name as sellName, cat.name as categoryName from ADVERTISEMENT ad, PROFESIONAL prof, SELL s, CATEGORY cat where ad.type = 1 and ad.deleted = 0 and ad.id_sell != 0 and s.id = ad.id_sell and s.id_profesional = cat.id and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 and ad.id_profesional = prof.id and ad.toDate >= CURDATE() and CURDATE() >= ad.fromDate

select , prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, prof.description as profesionalDescription, null as sellName, null as categoryName from ADVERTISEMENT ad, PROFESIONAL prof where ad.type = 2 and ad.deleted = 0 and ad.id_sell = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 and ad.id_profesional = prof.id and ad.toDate >= CURDATE() and CURDATE() >= ad.fromDate union all select , prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, prof.description as profesionalDescription, s.name as sellName, cat.name as categoryName from ADVERTISEMENT ad, PROFESIONAL prof, SELL s, CATEGORY cat where ad.type = 2 and ad.deleted = 0 and ad.id_sell != 0 and s.id = ad.id_sell and s.id_profesional = cat.id and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 and ad.id_profesional = prof.id and ad.toDate >= CURDATE() and CURDATE() >= ad.fromDate

select distinct , prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, prof.description as profesionalDescription, null as sellName, cat.name as categoryName from ADVERTISEMENT ad, PROFESIONAL prof, SELL s, HIGHLIGHTED_CAT hc, CATEGORY cat where ad.type = 2 and ad.deleted = 0 and ad.id_sell = 0 and ad.id_profesional = prof.id and ad.toDate >= CURDATE() and CURDATE() >= ad.fromDate and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 and s.id_profesional = prof.id and hc.deleted = 0 and hc.toDate >= CURDATE() and CURDATE() >= hc.fromDate and s.id_category = hc.id_category and cat.id = s.id_category union all select , prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, prof.description as profesionalDescription, s.name as sellName, cat.name as categoryName from ADVERTISEMENT ad, PROFESIONAL prof, SELL s, CATEGORY cat where ad.type = 2 and ad.deleted = 0 and ad.id_sell != 0 and s.id = ad.id_sell and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 and s.id_profesional = cat.id and ad.id_profesional = prof.id and ad.toDate >= CURDATE() and CURDATE() >= ad.fromDate and cat.id in ( select hc.id_category from HIGHLIGHTED_CAT hc where hc.deleted = 0 and hc.toDate >= CURDATE() and CURDATE() >= hc.fromDate )
